pkgmetadata.longdescription: # zaailabcorelib## IntroductionThis is our `zaailabcorelib` tools implemented and used widely in ZAI Lab. ## CompilingTo compile and upload package to PyPi```python3 setup.py sdist bdist_wheelpython3 -m twine upload --repository-url https://upload.pypi.org/legacy/ dist/* --verbose```## Contributors- [ 1 ] congvm - congvm.it@gmail.com- [ 2 ] tript - thanhtri2502@gmail.com- [ 3 ] tinhdm - minhtinh.1997.khmt@gmail.com
